title: Bloomberg Markets: Nisen on 'Disruptive' Graham-Cassidy Bill
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Nisen on 'Disruptive' Graham-Cassidy Bill
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Max Nisen Bloomberg Gadfly Columnist Bloomberg Editorial Discussing Graham-Cassidy health care, a last-ditch effort by Senate Republicans to repeal Obamacare, with Bret Schroeder, Partner at PA Consulting.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
